item.title: New Christy Minstrels - Today
item.description:
Today while the blossom
still cling to the vine
I’ll taste
your strawberries
I’ll drink
your sweet wine
A million tomorrows
shall all pass away
Ere I’ll forget all
the joy that is mine
today
I’ll be a dandy and
I’ll be a rover
You’ll know who
I am by the song
that I sing I’ll feast
at your table
I’ll sleep
in your clover
Who cares what
tomorrow- shall bring
Today while the blossom
still cling to the vine
I’ll taste
your strawberries
I’ll drink
your sweet wine
A million tomorrows
shall all pass away
Ere I’ll forget
all the joy
that is mine
today
I can’t be contented
with yesterday’s glory
I can’t live on
promises winter
to spring
Today is my moment
and now is my story
I’ll laugh and
I’ll cry and I’ll sing
Today while the blossom
still cling to the vine
I’ll taste
your strawberries
I’ll drink
your sweet wine
A million tomorrows
shall all pass away
Ere I’ll forget
all the joy
that is mine
today-

Today while the blossom
still cling to the vine
I’ll taste
your strawberries
I’ll drink
your sweet wine
A million tomorrows
shall all pass away
Ere I’ll forget
all the joy
that is mine
today-
